venue.name: United Martial Arts Center

item.description:
INTRODUCTION TO TAI CHI SEMINAR
Date: Saturday, October 20, 2012
Time: 11 AM â€“ 1:00 PM
Location: United Martial Arts Center (featuring Body Mind Systems)
Vinnin Square (adjacent to Marshalls)
1005 Paradise Road, Swampscott, MA 01907
Cost: $25 (regularly priced at $49)

Register now:
www.humanharmonies.com or call 781-581-8887

This seminar will introduce you to the form known as Tai Chi Chung which helps reduce stress in the body and mind while improving strength and stamina.

The long-term benefits of practicing Tai Chi include:
- Increased Qi (energy) in the body
- Increased physical strength and stamina
- Increased flexibility and balance
- Improved stress relief
- Improved natural healing abilities within the body
